welcome_message_body: Welcome to Catamarca, a charming city known for its colonial architecture, rich history, and breathtaking scenery. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that this beautiful destination has to offer.

restaurants.name: Antaño
restaurants.description: Antaño is a restaurant located in San Fernando del Valle de Catamarca.
restaurants.address: Rivadavia (Zurita), 4700 San Fernando del Valle de Catamarca, Catamarca
